entry.em: ..EXTREME HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THURSDAY

entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
